text: Anna Borysivna Sharyhina (born c.1978) is a Ukrainian activist who fights for the rights of women and the LBGT community. She is one of the founders of the Sphere Women's Association, a lesbian feminist organisation from Kharkiv, and of the NGO Kyiv Pride, the organizing committee of the Pride Parade in Kyiv.Claire Gaillard, Anna Sharyhina â€“ Ukraine, Hope for the Future, Les Spread the Word, 5 October 2015. Translated by Leanne Ross. Sharyhina and her partner, Vira Chemygina, have been part of the Ukrainian LBGT community and lesbian organizations for years. They organized Kyiv's first walks for equality. The second walk for equality in Kyiv was held in 2015. Police officers and public figurs supported the walk. However, the walk only lasted for 15 minutes because of the violence against the marchers. Ten people, including police officers guarding the event, were injured.Clara Marchaud, Kyiv Pride week events to raise awareness, defend LGBTQ rights, Kyiv Post, June 8, 2018. ==References== Category:1978 births CAtegory:Living people Category:Lesbian feminists Category:LGBT rights activists Category:Ukrainian activists
title: Anna Sharyhina
